question: [Detailed] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (146, 168), (176, 135), (161, 153).

qas.question: [Detailed] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (146, 168), (176, 135), (161, 153).
[Focus] Turkce: (146, 168), (176, 135), (161, 153) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla. Provide only the area.
[Brief] English: Compute the area and perimeter of the triangle defined by (146, 168), (176, 135), (161, 153). Provide only the perimeter.
